name: Thorne Book 1 (DEMO)
description:
What would you do if you could become... more?

Escaping a troubled past and moving towards an even more troubling future, Clara has found herself in some rather strange circumstances.

Follow her on her journey to the top of the enigmatic Midnight tower, discover the secrets of her past and face powerful foes hell-bent on killing you. On your way to the top, you'll encounter polite monstrosities, killer machines, bee farmers and stuck-up immortals. You'll learn to control your powers and with the help of your gun become an unstoppable force for... well. Yourself. Because this is a game about selfishness.

Thorne is a story a decade in the making. This little demo is what you can expect from the full game, whenever that becomes a reality. It is a story-driven RPG divided into (so far) nine floors, each containing a small slice of Clara's journey to the top. 

If you have a chance to play the game or would like to have early access to test versions, message me your feedback over on Instagram @thorne_dev or on Twitter @Thorne_Dev

NOTE: Currently only a Windows version is available, but I'm working on a Mac version in the future!
